scope-attr-valid:
Example table:
Monthly Expenses
Category Amount
Housing $1000
Transportation $500
Food $300
In this example, the scope attribute is used to indicate the scope of each header cell. The "Category" header cell has a scope of "col" because it applies to all the cells in the first column. The "Amount" header cell also has a scope of "col" because it applies to all the cells in the second column. To make this table more accessible, we can also add the following attributes: - element to provide a brief description of the table - and elements to group
